title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid creatures

description: A high school student finds a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it

description: Two strangers swap bodies repeatedly and work to prevent disaster

description: Two brothers seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies

description: A powerless boy attends a superhero academy and grows into a hero

description: Teenagers pilot giant robots to save humanity from mysterious beings

title: Ergo Proxy
description: A girl escapes her dome city and encounters a mysterious android

description: Space bounty hunters travel the galaxy in search of fugitives

title: Code Geass
description: A student gains the power to command anyone and leads a rebellion

description: Orphans discover their home is actually a farming facility and plan escape

description: A ninja dreams of becoming the strongest leader of his village

description: Pirates search for treasure while becoming friends and changing the world

description: A shy psychic boy navigates middle school while trying to control his powers

description: A man is reincarnated as a slime in a fantasy world and builds a kingdom
